QuestData.Title: Ysera's Tears
QuestData.Description: Good to see you again, $n! You were exceptionally efficient in completing the last task that I offered you. Perhaps you would be interested in another?$B$BTo the northeast lies Wyrmscar Island, home to a rare species of mushroom known as Ysera's tear - named after the green dragonlings that inhabit the island. I only require a small sampling of the mushroom, but I must warn you that the denizens of the island do not welcome visitors. Tread carefully.
QuestData.LogDescription: Maatparm at Blood Watch wants 2 Ysera's Tears.
QuestData.RewardText: I hope this wasn't too strenuous a task, $n. Once again you have proven yourself a competent and considerate $r. I offer my gratitude and a small bit of monetary compensation.
